text: Configuring your CNS Mail on your Android

steps.text: Tap ❶ 'Gmail' from the home page or the list of apps. If an email address is not set up in Gmail, go to STEP04. ＊ The settings and procedure may vary from device to device. However, the procedure for configuring a mail server are the same.
Tap the ❶ 'account icon' shown on the search bar and a list of accounts will be displayed.
Type '[your CNS login name]@sfc.keio.ac.jp' in ❶ . Then, tap ❷ 'NEXT >.'
Type your IMAP/SMTP-AUTH password in ❶ and tap ❷ 'NEXT >.'

Enter the following settings:

Once typed correctly, tap ❶ 'NEXT >.'

Next, type the information below if necessary.

Check ❶ 'Require signin.' Once entered correctly, tap ❷ 'NEXT >.'
You can modify your account options if you desire. Once you finished choosing your options, tap ❶ 'NEXT >.'

Type 'CNS' (or any other name you can use to distinguish from other mail accounts) in ❶ 'Give this account a name (optional)' and your full name in ❷ 'Your name (displayed on outgoing messages).' Then, tap ❸ 'NEXT >' to finish.

Configuring Your CNS Mail on Your Android Device is completed.
